item.title: CVE-2024-31288|2024-04-07T17:18:47.447Z -- RapidLoad -- RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in RapidLoad RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize.This issue affects RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize: from n/a through 2.2.11.
